divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work in Ann Arbor Mi on Pleasant lake road towards Manchester heading west when I noticed something in the sky to the south west, I pulled my car over to get a better look and it had advanced to my position very quickly. As it got near I turned off the engine and listened for sound, nothing. It seemed to be no more than 20 feet above the tree line, I would guess less though. When it got right over top of me I could see it was triangular with a solid light in each corner, one blue, one orange and one white. It continued north east and then I lost sight of it. There were no flashing lights at all just the dull solid lights in each corner. I have seen a lot of unusual things in the sky around Manchester for years but nothing as close to this. I have many other experiences to relate if interested.
Summary: Triangular object flew over my car towards the north east.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around July 8th 2010
